summary: Pan has been an old and faithful friend

description: Pan gets updated maybe twice a year now and they aren't keeping up with the bugs. This version segfaults when retrieving headers from any decently sized newsgroup.
summary: Used to be great, segfaults constantly now

description:
Pan version .146
Can't post, get the following error:

Error: Bad email address
Keps crashing when I try to pull in the headers, and it never shows any headers, even in groups that I know are populated.

I really like the app for reading netnews. It does the job well with a familiar interface not unlike that of many email clients. However, there's an issue where the email part of the post header has quotes put in it before its sent off; it seems news servers don't like this and reject such postings. I submitted a patch to the mailing list (*thumbs nose at GitHub*), but I've no idea if it even reached anybody.
summary: Great for reading, had issues posting

description: Die Version 0.146 sollte nicht installiert werden, das Absenden von Nachrichten ist nicht möglich. Es gibt eine neuere Version 0.147 und 0.148 beta.
Pan est rapide, propose une interface clair et est très robuste.
a very good nntp reader, but not as powerful as gnus
